items.title: "Pham also led an agency that struggled to contain COVID-19...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

"Pham also led an agency that struggled to contain COVID-19 outbreaks within detention centers holding immigrants. Several ICE detainees who tested positive for COVID-19 have died in government custody this year.

In October, ICE officials also began implementing a policy that allows officers to arrest and rapidly deport undocumented immigrants who have been in the US for less than two years. Pham said officers and agents needed to finish a training course by Oct. 16, after which they could begin using their new authority."

Tony Pham, a refugee from Vietnam, oversaw an effort to plaster billboards with the faces of immigrants along highways in Pennsylvania.

buzzfeednews.com

ICE‚Äôs Controversial Leader Plans To Resign After Five Months On The Job

items.title: Join us Friday, December 18 at 7 p.m. for a premiere virtual screening of ‚ÄúThe Facility.‚Äù ...
items.content_html:
Join us Friday, December 18 at 7 p.m. for a premiere virtual screening of “The Facility.”

“The Facility” is a short documentary film chronicling the lived experiences of immigrants being held at the GEO detention facility in Aurora, Colorado. This film addresses the personal loss and consequences caused by for-profit detention and the federal government's broken immigration policies. Legal and medical experts highlight horrific abuses including death, medical neglect, nutrition issues, and prolonged detention during the coronavirus pandemic. To tell their stories, current and former detainees, families fighting to be reunited, and advocates come together to share their experiences behind the walls of the GEO immigration detention facility in Aurora.

@acluofcolorado @coloradopeoplesalliance @co_immigrant @keshagrijalva @_floodlight_

Following the screening will be a Q&A session with the director, legal experts, and individuals featured in the film with first-hand experience of the systemic abuse occurring inside the facility.

Panelists include:

Jeremy Flood, “The Facility” Director
Raul Medina Perez, COPA, Community Organizer who was formerly detained at GEO
Kesha Davalos Grijalva, Immigrant rights advocate whose husband is detained at GEO
Keinada Andereas, Colorado Student who was formerly detained at GEO
Hans Meyer, The Meyer Law Office, Lead Attorney
Denise Maes, ACLU of Colorado, Public Policy Director

Please RSVP for the screening in advance for this free event: https://aclu.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_nUbTy8-VQpif8nMzqtUzQw

Trailer: https://youtu.be/cGOCejy48Jo

“The Facility” is presented by ACLU of Colorado, Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition, and Colorado Hispanic Bar Association.

items.title: ICE agents are vile, lying thugs. The only goal of ICE as a...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

ICE agents are vile, lying thugs. The only goal of ICE as a state agency is to harm people, instill terror, and wreck lives. The people who make up the ranks of ICE are enemies of humanity, and the long but inevitable arc of justice will judge them accordingly.

"A common tactic that accompanies this ruse is under public scrutiny once again. This time, in New York where a man who has been a resident of the city for over 30 years was apprehended in October 2020. Agents waited ...outside of his job as a chef in Harlem after his wife was confronted at their home. ICE agents identified themselves to her as police at the couples‚Äô apartment and showed her a photo of another man, not her husband. They led her to believe that there was an honest mix-up and if she helped them identify her husband, she would in effect be resolving the case of mistaken identity. After they received the identifying information that they needed from her which included his cell phone number, the agents arrested Fernando Santos-Rodriguez at the restaurant where he was arriving to begin his morning shift."

https://imm-print.com/ice-agents-step-up-deceptive-tactics‚Ä¶/

See MoreBeware: ICE endorses the practice of their agents falsely posing as police officers in order to gain access to homes, spread confusion and apprehend immigrants.

items.title: ‚Äú‚ÄòI want to leave because when I get mad they give me...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

‚Äú‚ÄòI want to leave because when I get mad they give me shots,‚Äô said the boy, whose name is redacted in the public court filings. ‚ÄòI think the last time was about a month ago. When they give me a shot, it makes me feel sad. And then I will sleep for a day. When I wake up after, I feel desperate. My body feels desperate.‚Äô

In the last months of the Trump administration, other immigrant youth in government custody have been drugged and isolated for long periods, according to court records. The documents describe children languishing for months, including a young ‚Äònonverbal‚Äô girl who was separated from her father at the border over a year ago and is now unable to directly communicate with her family in Guatemala.‚Äù

"When I get mad they give me shots."

items.title: Fuck Councilwoman Bergan!
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

Fuck Councilwoman Bergan!

Candice Bailey

My friend posted this and I am livid:
Aurora liberals' two most favorite white ladies to make excuses for just voted to elevate Francoise "Thin Blue Line Wearin...g, They're Not Concentration Camps, Republican Ass Republican" Bergan to the Mayor Pro Tem seat rather than stand in solidarity behind the Brown Emerge sister and LIFELONG ORIGINAL AURORA RESIDENT they came into office with in 2017.

That's it. Chopped. Done. I've spent twelve months telling people what it is. If you still support these two after today, you are beyond complicit. I don't care what our history is: unfriend me, or I'll do it for you. We're done.

Can't say I detect a lie! Christopher Savin and I have been screaming for a year. We watched Johnston slaughter Crystal Murillo publicly, with NO REMORSE. This is not an advancement for the people of Aurora. Can't say we weren't warning everyone.
Absolutely DISRESPECTFUL to the residents of this city.

Abolish ICE DenverParty for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

It‚Äôs almost 1, and the Aurora Civil Service Commission meeting is beginning soon. Get ready to call in!

Beginning next week, the Commission will begin private ...hearings to decide whether to overturn the firing of APD officers Erica Marrero, Kyle Dittrich, and Jason Rosenblatt.

Marrero and Dittrich, pictured left, took photos mocking Elijah McClain‚Äôs death at his memorial site and sent them to the cops who tortured and killed Elijah, Nathan Woodyard and Jason Rosenblatt.

Rosenblatt wrote back ‚Äúhaha‚Äù and was caught. He was fired for this incident and remains the only one of Elijah‚Äôs killers who lost his job.

These cops have demonstrated that they have absolutely no business patrolling our streets, armed, with the ability to decide if people like Elijah live or die. We demand that they are NOT reinstated!

Tune in to our stories for live updates during the meeting!

#justiceforelijahmcclain
